sentences.sContent: Enya’s success has contributed substantially to the current interest in Celtic music.
sentences.sCn: 时下人们对凯尔特音乐感兴趣，这很大程度上要归功于恩雅的成功。

sentences.sContent: City employees cannot contribute to political campaigns.
sentences.sCn: 市政府雇员不得捐助政治宣传活动。

synos.tran: 贡献，出力；[图情]投稿；[经]捐献
贡献，出力；[图情]投稿；[经]捐献

remMethod.val: con ＋ tribute(给予) → 共同给予 → 捐献

words.tran: 捐助的；贡献的；有助于…的
出资的；贡献的；有助于；助长...的

trans.tranOther: to help to make something happen
